helloldap.auth.views¶

Views to handle authentication and authorization.

helloldap.auth.views.authenticate(request)[source]¶

Authenticates given user against LDAP.

If given credentials are correct, returns a JWT that contains this payload (dict):

  • ‘u’: Username that was given as part of the credentials
  • ‘g’: List of groups the user is member of.

More details about the payload are described here: helloldap.auth.jwt_tools.encode().

Parameters:request – Current request
Returns:JWT as string.
